import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Image, Card, Button, } from 'react-bootstrap' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/paymentStep' import ErrorMessageBox from '../components/ErrorMessagebox' // import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' export default function paymentScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.qty, 0) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 10 cart.taxPrice = Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) console.log(cart.taxPrice) cart.totalPrice = cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice + cart.taxPrice const dispatch = useDispatch() const placeOrderHandler = () => { // dispatch( // createOrder({ // orderItems: cart.cartItems, // shippingAddress: cart.shippingAddress, // paymentMethod: cart.paymentMethod, // itemsPrice: cart.itemsPrice, // shippingPrice: cart.shippingPrice, // taxPrice: cart.taxPrice, // totalPrice: cart.totalPrice, // }) // ) } const orderCreate = useSelector((state) => state.orderCreate) const { success, order, error } = orderCreate useEffect(() => { if (success) { props.history.push(`/order/${order._id}`) } }, [success]) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} {error && ( {error} )} ) }
